Data Fields
flash_writepage_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Flash Memory

Flash page write data using I_FLASH_WRITEPAGE. More...

#include <flash.h>

Detailed Description

This structure is used to write data to the flash using I_FLASH_WRITEPAGE.

Data Fields

u32 addr
 
u32 nbyte
 
u8 buf [FLASH_MAX_WRITE_SIZE]
 A buffer for writing to the flash.
 

Field Documentation

◆ addr

u32 flash_writepage_t::addr

The address to write to

◆ nbyte

u32 flash_writepage_t::nbyte

The number of bytes to write
